member.name: MFSampleEncryptionProtectionScheme
member.summary: Specifies the supported protection schemes for encrypted samples.

member.name: MFSampleEncryptionProtectionScheme.MF_SAMPLE_ENCRYPTION_PROTECTION_SCHEME_AES_CTR
member.summary: The encryption scheme is AES counter mode (CTR).

member.name: MFSampleEncryptionProtectionScheme.MF_SAMPLE_ENCRYPTION_PROTECTION_SCHEME_AES_CBC
member.summary: The encryption scheme is Cipher Block Chaining (CBC).
